name: Popsa Holdings Limited
description: Provider of automated photo book printing services intended to bring customizable printed goods to audiences using technology. The company's application uses narrow AI technology which auto-generates photo books with the selected photos and provides editing options, enabling users to create personalized prints such as photo books, calendars, and boxes of prints.
